'''Endless Waltz''' is [[Furina]]'s [[1st Ascension Passive]].
<!--
==Gameplay Notes==
-->
==Gameplay Notes==
* Healing from another player's Furina in [[Co-Op Mode]] counts as a source that is "not Furina herself." This applies for the healing from both her Elemental Skill and this Ascension Passive.
